span.p: April 6, 2020 Update: At the direction of Governor Andrew Cuomo, all schools will now remain closed through April 29. Please continue to monitor the district website for updates as this is a constantly evolving situation.

img.title: Welcome to the Palmyra-Macedon Central School District
img.alt: Welcome to the Palmyra-Macedon Central School District

div.h1: WELCOME TO PALMYRA-MACEDON CENTRAL SCHOOL DISTRICT!

span.strong: All students will receive a world-class, relevant education.

div.a: 2020 Valedictorian and Salutatorian Announcement

span.p: Palmyra-Macedon High School is proud to announce the 2020 Valedictorian is Brynn Grandusky and the Salutatorian is Katarina Voss.
